titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4264) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal year 1989 amended budget request for military functions of the Department of Defense and to prescribe military personnel levels for such Department for fiscal year 1989, to amend the National Defense Authorization Act for fiscal years 1988 and 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-579.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 343 - 56 (Record Vote No: 67).

bill.summary: 4/25/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4264 (armed forces funding).
